extensionDescription.message: Capture screenshots, right-click on pictures, or get an an overview of all pics in the tab, to either (bulk) download or use them on ImgOps.com.

loadImagesOnOpen.message: Scrape pictures and display them when opening the popup

copied.message: Picture has been copied to the clipboard! (Press CTRL + V to paste ðŸ“‹)

kbdExit.message: You can also use the following keys to exit:

screenshotInfo.message: Drag anywhere on the page to start selection OR press the Exit button

errorimgNotSupported.message: ImgOps does not support the format of this picture

errorBlob.message: Base64 image could not be converted into BLOB

errorFiles.message: Picture(s) couldn't be converted into file(s)

notSupported.message: Page doesn't support scripting or wasn't fully loaded yet
